title: Stop making dodges on series count as a loss.
body: Because I'm tired of getting trolls in champ select and being forced to play with people who play Garen support and Kog Maw jungle.

replies.body: I got an on-hit attack speed TF jungle in the deciding game of my promos... I wish I couldve dodged.

> [{quoted}](name=Wofye,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wzaOEMkV,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-20T21:07:24.452+0000)
>
> I got an on-hit attack speed TF jungle in the deciding game of my promos... I wish I couldve dodged.

90% of the stupid shit that people could do happens in series/promos. 

I ended up winning my series to Gold, but the FIRST TWO games back to back had at least 1 troll.   I honestly didn't think I'd win 3 in a row after those debacles.

I've seen a plethora of posts asking for various ways of fixing this (some of which have been legitimately good ideas) and it's a shame it hasn't happened.

When trolls are lurking and people are dodging, and you're unable to dodge, it is inevitable that you will eventually be hit with the troll. Being completely unable to dodge seems unfair. Even if it's a charge system that takes a while to get to, being able to dodge while in promos would make a huge difference.

Anyways, my 2 cents with an upvote. At least there are now the free-wins at low elo's if you lose a series and get back to it, those likely more than outweigh the inability to dodge. Not sure how many issues there are in plat+ though (I see like nothing in games with mostly gold 3 ish players).

It is pretty unfair, cause during my first series from Bronze 5 to Bronze 4, I needed 1 win JUST 1, but then my team was a 4 man premade and went

Thresh top, Bard adc, Soraka jg, and Braum support.

I vote we have it dodging twice during a series counts as 1 loss.
you have a lot more problems if you are stuck in bronze v

> [{quoted}](name=Hebiki,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wzaOEMkV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-20T04:39:58.531+0000)
>
> you have a lot more problems if you are stuck in bronze v

I'm Bronze 2 presently, the problem isn't how I'm playing but it's the bans people are making,

My team actually banned, {{champion:6}} and {{champion:83}} once so I had to choose between Fizz or Zed, so that game was not on me, my team typically just chooses whatever beat them in lane in the last game.

You are gold 5 since three seasons. You not being able to get out of gold is not the fault of trolls or afks or something. You are granted a free win in promos if you enter them a second time and people are still crying. Get good. 

If dodging during promos would be allowed everyone would dodge the eternity out of this.

> [{quoted}](name=Hi lm Negan,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wzaOEMkV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-20T12:52:07.633+0000)
>
> You are gold 5 since three seasons. You not being able to get out of gold is not the fault of trolls or afks or something. You are granted a free win in promos if you enter them a second time and people are still crying. Get good. 
> 
> If dodging during promos would be allowed everyone would dodge the eternity out of this.

? Never said anything about getting out of Gold.  I only just got into gold this season just last night lol.
Then you'd just have people constantly dodging their promo games until they get the champ/role/teamcomp/enemy teamcomp combination they feel happy with.

Each game has 9 players in it rather than just you though.
If you feel like dodging 1/20 games, and the other 9 players feel like dodging 1/20 games: then you're going to have to sit through 2 pick/ban phases for every 1 game you actually get into.

Also: you queued to play the game, so play the game. Don't waste everyone's time because you decided to not play a game after you told the world "i wanna play a game".
9 other people wanted to play a game, and if picks/bans took 5 minutes, it wasted a collective ~45 minutes.
Especially because you decided to let the picks/bans clock run down to the last couple of seconds before dodging the queue to spite whatever pick you're being a primadonna about, which subsequently makes the experience that much worse for the other 8 players in queue.
